attributes.review: My eleven year olds daughter was just playing on the app when she accidentally called him and he spit on her! 😱🤬😳🤯 I thought this was the Uber eats app and she was going to order some more food.😧🤯😯😳🤫😪😤🐁🤯👁👁🥵 NOW I DONT HAVE BABIES AND MY GRAND BABY HAS CORONAVIRUS! 🚼🌈🤫😭🥵🍊
attributes.title: Trump spit on my baby through the phone!

attributes.review: My Uncle’s Girlfriend’s Cousin’s Sister-In-Law’s ExHusband’s Niece’s Nephew’s Father is a Trump supporter and he downloaded the app and within an hour of listening & reading the bigotry, racism, & ignorant comments made by our president Donald J. Trump, He died. So just a warning to anyone who downloads this app.
attributes.title: *May Cause Death*
